channel.title: Log on Miaomi
channel.description: Recent content in Log on Miaomi

item.title: Connect Git to Github
item.description: 在git bash终端创建两个SSH key: ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa_m -C "firstmail@gmail.com" #绑定hugo网站源代码存放的GitHub所用的邮箱 ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa -C "secondmail@gmail.com" #绑定另一个GitHub

item.title: Blog Build With GitHub Action
item.description: Prerequisite 将本地仓库推送到GitHub：[[Connect git to GitHub]] Reference Build Hugo With GitHub Action Create and host a blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages in less than 30 minutes Creating a personal access token 基于 Github Action 自动构建 Hugo 博客 - (lix

item.title: Blog Building Logs
item.description: References Hugo Docs: A very brief and useful quick start, didn’t spent too much time. Hugo tutorial by CloudCannon: Got a roughly picture of the file hierarchy of Hugo. Build Websites with Hugo: A complete guide to work with Hugo, got a clue to change the /themes and other files. Hugo In Action Hugo-stack-theme 主题魔改版 不是从零开始的 Hugo 建站笔
